title: Ganzheitliche Stadtentwicklung als integrative Stadtentwicklungsplanung

items.abstract: <jats:p>A special system of coordinates has been introduced for the calculation of electromagnetic wave propagation in an inhomogeneous, anisotropic medium. One of the coordinate axes is parallel to the wave normal, the two others (perpendicular to it) are defined by the relation between the E and D̃ vector. In the coupled wave equations it is shown that the coupling terms can be neglected under certain conditions.</jats:p>
title: Gekoppelte Wellengleichungen für inhomogene anisotrope Medien
